title: Has the "show notifications silently" feature been done away with? I don't have it as an option. 3XL
content:
There used to be an option (on previous versions of Android) to "show notifications silently". I don't have it as an option on my new 3XL.

Am I missing something? Not all apps have the option to do it from their settings so it was easiest to set it from the notifications screen.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
